name: Bugged
description: Engineers throughout Starfleet are overworked in the face of an unprecedented amount of issues aboard ships fleetwide. From replicator malfunctions to transporter mix-ups, it's an entire career's worth of space misadventures in a matter of weeks.
rules:
-- Unique Augments, Borg, and Hirogen Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Booker, Scotty, Hemmer, or Jury Riggers will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Booker, Scotty, Hemmer, or Jury Riggers
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Rojan
featured_crew.flavor: To ensure the survival of his species and preserve his civilization, Rojan captured the U.S.S. Enterprise to return home.

action.name: We Do Not Colonize. We Conquer.

featured_crew.name: Scotty
featured_crew.flavor: Remaining as chief engineer of the U.S.S. Enterprise, Scott decided that he had to fix the problems in the holodeck himself.

action.name: Dpn't Worry, I've Got Everything Under Control.

featured_crew.name: Hemmer
featured_crew.flavor: Hemmer is the Chief Engineer of the USS Enterprise under Captain Pike. He will not fight for Starfleet, but he will defend its ideals.

rewards.name: Augment Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Augments faction missions.

rewards.name: Borg Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Borg faction missions.

rewards.name: Hirogen Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Hirogen faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

action.name: We Do Not Colonize. We Conquer.

rewards.name: Hemmer
rewards.flavor: Hemmer is the Chief Engineer of the USS Enterprise under Captain Pike. He will not fight for Starfleet, but he will defend its ideals.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Rojan
rewards.flavor: To ensure the survival of his species and preserve his civilization, Rojan captured the U.S.S. Enterprise to return home.

action.name: We Do Not Colonize. We Conquer.

rewards.name: Hemmer
rewards.flavor: Hemmer is the Chief Engineer of the USS Enterprise under Captain Pike. He will not fight for Starfleet, but he will defend its ideals.

screens.text: "When I said I wanted a good challenge, this wasn't what I meant. Food synthesizers spitting out a filet mignon when asked for a vegetarian meal. Navigational computers directed toward Earth instead leading us toward Qo'noS. And don't get me started on the warp core."

"Come now, Mr. Scott, it's not all that bad. Think of all that vacation time you're banking. A transporter malfunction here or there is a small price to pay for a nice stretch of shore leave, isn't it?"
"I'd rather a functional ship and a steady workday than all the shore leave in the galaxy. I'm doing what I can to keep my Enterprise in the stars. If I see one more tribble, I swear--"

"Fair enough. As you just heard, Captain, we're all stretched pretty thin here. We're doing all we can just to keep things going, let alone having time to actually evaluate the causes. Could you help us?"
